name: Sid Meier's Civilization: Beyond Earth - Exoplanets Map Pack
summary: The Exoplanets map pack includes six custom maps inspired by real-world exoplanets. Specialized scripts produce randomized geographic layouts each time a new game begins, allowing for even more replayability on new alien worlds.Maps include: Kepler 186f: This lush forest planet is one of the oldest known Earth-like planets.
